channel.title: Need help! What is Client.Java?
channel.description:
I looked at SO MANY OF THE TUTORIALS and each tutorial talks about CLIENT.JAVA!!!!!
I don't have a Client.Java file when downloaded MoparScape.
WHAT IS CLIENT.JAVA?
Someone PLEASE TELL ME!!!!!!!!!!
edit: Also, I have a MACINTOSH, not WINDOWS XP, I CANNOT USE THOSE DOWNLOADS BECAUSE THOSE ARE WINDOWS ONLY!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Need help! What is Client.Java?
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

dude are you serious most of those are servers not clients

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! What is Client.Java?
item.dc:creator: @abcNoob abcNoob
item.description:
@abcNoob wrote:

Okay, if I have to find a SOURCE, tell me a GOOD place to FIND SOURCES, because when I look in the RS2 SERVER DOWNLOAD section, I only see people putting their CLIENTS there for DOWNLOAD. I AM LOOKING FOR SERVERS, NOT CLIENTS!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! What is Client.Java?
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

You need to download a source before you can make a server.
And moparscape is a client not a server, so download a source in rs2 server download

Read full topic
